data.name: zola
data.description: Open chat interface for all your models.
data.description_zh: 为所有模型打开聊天界面。
data.readme_content: # Zola [zola.chat](https://zola.chat) **Zola** is the open-source chat interface for all your models. ![zola cover](https://zenly.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/mcp/repos/ibelick/zola/readme-images/1751640148581.jpg) ## Features - Multi-model support: OpenAI, Mistral, Claude, Gemini, Ollama (local models) - Bring your own API key (BYOK) support via OpenRouter - File uploads - Clean, responsive UI with light/dark themes - Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and prompt-kit - Open-source and self-hostable - Customizable: user system prompt, multiple layout options - Local AI with Ollama: Run models locally with automatic model detection - Full MCP support (wip) ## Quick Start ### Option 1: With OpenAI (Cloud) ```bash git clone https://github.com/ibelick/zola.git cd zola npm install echo "OPENAI_API_KEY=your-key" > .env.local npm run dev ``` ### Option 2: With Ollama (Local) ```bash # Install and start Ollama curl -fsSL https://ollama.ai/install.sh | sh ollama pull llama3.2 # or any model you prefer # Clone and run Zola git clone https://github.com/ibelick/zola.git cd zola npm install npm run dev ``` Zola will automatically detect your local Ollama models! ### Option 3: Docker with Ollama ```bash git clone https://github.com/ibelick/zola.git cd zola docker-compose -f docker-compose.ollama.yml up ``` [![Deploy with Vercel](https://zenly.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/mcp/repos/ibelick/zola/readme-images/1751640150361.svg)](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/ibelick/zola) To unlock features like auth, file uploads, see [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/ibelick/zola/blob/main/INSTALL.md). ## Built with - [prompt-kit](https://prompt-kit.com/) — AI components - [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com) — core components - [motion-primitives](https://motion-primitives.com) — animated components - [vercel ai sdk](https://vercel.com/blog/introducing-the-vercel-ai-sdk) — model integration, AI features - [supabase](https://supabase.com) — auth and storage ## Sponsors ## License Apache License 2.0 ## Notes This is a beta release. The codebase is evolving and may change.
data.readme_content_zh: # Zola [zola.chat](https://zola.chat) **Zola** 是适用于所有模型的开放源代码聊天界面。 ![zola cover](https://zenly.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/mcp/repos/ibelick/zola/readme-images/1751640148581.jpg) ## 功能 - 支持多模型：OpenAI、Mistral、Claude、Gemini、Ollama（本地模型） - 通过 OpenRouter 支持自带 API 密钥（BYOK） - 文件上传 - 简洁响应式 UI，支持亮色/暗色主题 - 基于 Tailwind CSS、shadcn/ui 和 prompt-kit 构建 - 开源且可自托管 - 可定制：用户系统提示、多种布局选项 - 本地 AI（Ollama）：自动检测模型，本地运行模型 - 完整 MCP 支持（wip） ## 快速上手 ### 选项 1：使用 OpenAI（云端） ```bash git clone https://github.com/ibelick/zola.git cd zola npm install echo "OPENAI_API_KEY=your-key" > .env.local npm run dev ``` ### 选项 2：使用 Ollama（本地） ```bash # 安装并启动 Ollama curl -fsSL https://ollama.ai/install.sh | sh ollama pull llama3.2 # 或您喜欢的任何模型 # 克隆并运行 Zola git clone https://github.com/ibelick/zola.git cd zola npm install npm run dev ``` Zola 将自动检测您的本地 Ollama 模型！ ### 选项 3：使用 Ollama 的 Docker ```bash git clone https://github.com/ibelick/zola.git cd zola docker-compose -f docker-compose.ollama.yml up ``` [![使用 Vercel 部署](https://zenly.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/mcp/repos/ibelick/zola/readme-images/1751640150361.svg)](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/ibelick/zola) 要解锁认证、文件上传等功能，请参阅 [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/ibelick/zola/blob/main/INSTALL.md)。 ## 技术栈 - [prompt-kit](https://prompt-kit.com/) — AI 组件 - [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com) — 核心组件 - [motion-primitives](https://motion-primitives.com) — 动画组件 - [vercel ai sdk](https://vercel.com/blog/introducing-the-vercel-ai-sdk) — 模型集成、AI 功能 - [supabase](https://supabase.com) — 认证和存储 ## 赞助商 ## 许可证 Apache License 2.0 ## 注意事项 这是一个测试版本。代码库仍在发展中，可能发生变化。
